StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Neuropsychiatric Genetics of African Populations - Psychosis (NeuroGAP-Psychosis)

Person.Organization: COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY HEALTH SCIENCESBOSTON UNIVERSITY MEDICAL CAMPUSHARVARD SCHOOL OF PUBLIC HEALTH

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This genotype and phenotype data comes from part of the NeuroGAP-Psychosis study, which was funded by the Stanley Center for Psychiatric Research at the Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard. The protocol for this study has been published (Stevenson A, Akena D, Stroud RE, et al. Neuropsychiatric Genetics of African Populations-Psychosis (NeuroGAP-Psychosis): a case-control study protocol and GWAS in Ethiopia, Kenya, South Africa and Uganda. BMJ Open 2019;9:e025469. doi: 10.1136/bmjopen-2018-025469). The principal investigators providing this data request that publications resulting from this dataset be cited as authors as follows: Dickens Akena, Lukoye Atwoli, Symon M. Kariuki, Charles R.J.C. Newton, Dan J. Stein, Solomon Teferra, Zukiswa Zingela, and the NeuroGAP-Psychosis Study Team.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Mental Health, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-MLHLTH-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Mental Health. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
